text: Venkataramanan Balakrishnan, Michael and Katherine Birck Head Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Purdue University, was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for contributions to convex optimization in control systems. ==Education== Balakrishnan received a B.Tech. degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology in Madras, India. He attended Stanford University where he received a M.S. degree in Statistics followed by a M.S. and Ph.D. degrees in Electrical Engineering.Brief Biography == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Stanford University alumni Category:Stanford University School of Engineering alumni Category:Indian Institute of Technology Madras alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
